title: Add Google Search Console verification file

requirements.text: Add the Google Search Console HTML verification file with the name 'google61423bcf1843cd2d.html' to the frontend public directory so that it is served as a static file at the path /google61423bcf1843cd2d.html. The file content must be exactly: 'google-site-verification: google61423bcf1843cd2d.html' as required by Google Search Console.

quotes: google61423bcf1843cd2d.html ( can you add this within the code ) it's a verification code from google search console

acceptanceCriteria: A file named 'google61423bcf1843cd2d.html' exists in the frontend public directory.
The file is accessible at the URL path /google61423bcf1843cd2d.html when the app is running.
The file content matches the standard Google Search Console HTML verification format: 'google-site-verification: google61423bcf1843cd2d.html'.
No existing app functionality or routing is affected by the addition of this file.

constraints: Do not modify any existing pages, components, or routing logic.
The verification file must be served as a plain static file, not rendered as a React route.
nonGoals: Adding any Google Analytics or Tag Manager scripts.
Changes to any existing UI components or pages.
